overview:
Rick Treese currently serves as Chief Technology Officer at TheMarkets.com, where he is charged with leading all technology initiatives and driving platform innovation, along with ensuring the Technology team and infrastructure are world class.

Before joining TheMarkets.com, Treese was Chief Technology Officer at business media company Advanstar Inc., where he led all enterprise technology efforts and directed the implementation of platforms and processes supporting the firmâ€™s hundreds of web properties.

Prior to this, Treese was Vice President at Goldman Sachs where he managed all application development for the Equity Research Division, including the build of key software used for research authoring and delivery.

He is co-author of CTO Leadership Strategies, published by Aspatore Books.
